name: Army Cargo Truck Mission 3D
description:
Army Cargo Truck Mission 3D!!!Become a daring army truck driver in this paramount of truck driving games. Play one of the most exciting army truck driving games with army cargo truck transport and forget other cargo transport games having the concept of long wheel truck games. Revitalize your army transport games fun in a startling truck driving simulator that requires high precision in this finest of truck driving games.

features:
- Realistic graphics and physics
- Three different realistic trucks to drive
- Traffic
- Arrows, steering wheel and accelerometer controls
- More than 90 levels to complete
